tool_description: CA Postal Code(ex. T6H, or A0A0A1 ), FSA and LDU, Boundaries API: A simple & very fast API that will allow you to integrate multiple GeoJson CA FSA and LDU level boundaries result into your apps and systems. This API is designed to be used programatically for optimal performance. When using the MashApe UI for queries expect significant latency issues on large result sets!
name: ca.boundaries.io
title: ca.boundaries.io

api_list.name: Query by FSA Code
api_list.description: Query by Postal FSA ( example T6H )

required_parameters.name: postal-fsa
required_parameters.description: Query by value postal code FSA, example: \"A0A\"

api_list.name: Query for City names by province/territory name
api_list.description: Query for City names by province/territory name

api_list.name: Query for City Boundary by City name
api_list.description: Query for City Boundary by City name

api_list.name: Query for All Province / Territory names
api_list.description: Query for All Province / Territory names
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vanitysoft-canada-postal-boundaries-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/ca/province/name"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vanitysoft-canada-postal-boundaries-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vanitysoft-canada-postal-boundaries-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/ca/province/name"

headers = {

api_list.name: Query for LDU Boundary by Location and Resolution
api_list.description: Query for LDU H3 Boundary by Location and Resolution

api_list.name: Query for LDU Boundary by H3Index
api_list.description:
Query for Boundary by H3Index.
Query for a LDU boundary by H3 Index, if a LDU Postal Code does not exist within the H3 Index Hexagon, an empty FeatureCollection is returned.

**H3Index resolution must be greater than 8.**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vanitysoft-canada-postal-boundaries-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/ca/h3/ldu/index/635775751926485631"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vanitysoft-canada-postal-boundaries-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vanitysoft-canada-postal-boundaries-v1.p.rapidapi.com/rest/v1/public/boundary/ca/h3/ldu/index/{h3ndex}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vanitysoft-canada-postal-boundaries-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.description: Query by a LDU Postal Code
